cause.description:
The rainbow ribbon campaign is actually a combination of different ribbon campaigns. It fits almost every cause one can think of, and includes, but is not limited to, the following:
- Curing disease: AIDS, cancer, Alzheimer, Parkinson, Autism, Asthma, Diabetes ... - An end to violence against men, women, and children. - A prayer to end drinking and driving. - An end to war and a hope for peace. - Treating others kindly. - Being friends with others rather than enemies. - Ending child abuse/molestation. - Freedom of speech. - A world where skin color/religion/sexual orientation doesn't matter. - Each one of us can be happy. - Gender equality (no gender is better than the other). - Think Green: Save our planet.
Suggestions are welcome!!!
1. Tolerance & Respect.
2. Similarities outweigh differences.
3. United we stand, divided we fall.
4. There is only one race, THE HUMAN RACE.
cause.mission: Being the best we can be without forgetting who we are.
